creator: REHAU AG + Co
descriptionHtml:
REHAU NEA SMART 2.0. With smart regulation, the right feel-good climate
Even smarter and more comfortable:
With the intuitive NEA SMART 2.0 app from REHAU, you now have the opportunity to regulate the comfort temperature of your surface heating and cooling anytime and anywhere.

The intelligent individual room control not only allows you to keep the desired temperature room by room according to time programs or innovative geofencing function, but also helps you to save the environment and your wallet thanks to integrated energy monitoring and other smart functions such as window-open detection and automatic updates. In addition to the simple operation and the smart functions, the control also impresses with its attractive design, uncomplicated installation, and the possibility of expert remote maintenance via app.

Requirements:
To use the REHAU NEA SMART 2.0 app you need the NEA SMART 2.0 components for your underfloor heating.

More information about the system can be found at http://www.rehau.com/neasmart2
descriptionShort: The new generation of intelligent room control - smarter and more convenient

descriptionShort: The new generation of intelligent room control - smarter and more convenient

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Feature:
- Push notifications to keep you always updated
Fixed bugs:
- Improved log-in
- Several smaller bug fixes
Improvements:
- More precise geolocation and map for setting up the installation location
- Improved message center with option to send report (PDF/email)
- Improved texts & translations
- Improved global energy level selection
General:
- Disabled room photo function for the time being as a part of performance optimization measures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Features:
- All users: Add in APP Trigger for deletion of personal data
- Installers: Support for Slow Reacting System added (latest controller and room unit firmware required)

Improvements:
- Improved Log-In performance
- Improved menus into dynamic view of existing attached devices (e.g. Mixed Circuits)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved Statistic retrieval
Improved Log In Phase
Improved Local Time Setting
Added Room Names inside of the Notifications

title: NEA SMART 2.0

creator: REHAU Industries SE & Co. KG
descriptionHtml:
NEA SMART 2.0 is a smart connected indoor climate solution increasing home comfort while saving up to 20% energy. NEA SMART 2.0 companion app enables heating and cooling control by smart features in the most convenient and effective way.

Intelligent. Anytime. Anywhere.



Key Features:



▪ Individual room temperature control
▪ Smart schedules
▪ Insights & Statistics

▪ Quick actions (e.g. home/away, party, holiday)

▪ Window open detection
▪ Predictive temperature adjustment based on local weather information

▪ Location based control (Geofencing)
▪ Voice Control (Alexa)
▪ Notifications
▪ Remote support
▪ Installer/Expert Mode (in depth settings)
descriptionShort: The new generation of intelligent room control - smarter and more convenient
